MINECRAFT_EULA.description: Do you accept the Minecraft EULA?

MINECRAFT_JAR.description: Include an .jar file link to use as your server (remove the "https://" part from the address).

AWS_BUCKET.description: [Optional] S3 Bucket to store your server state (*you will NOT lose your games when the server restarts, but you can't restore your data if something unexpected happens)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: [Optional] The AWS access key for the S3 Bucket

AWS_SECRET_KEY.description: [Optional] The AWS secret key for the S3 Bucket
